_comment2: Rename this file to config.json and adjust the values to your setup.
_comment_server_port: The port on which the TS6 Viewer web interface will be available. Usually '8080'
_comment_theme: Choose between 'light' or 'dark' for the viewer theme. Usually 'dark'
_comment_refresh_interval: How often the viewer should auto-refresh (in seconds). Usually '60'

teamspeak6._comment_base_url: The WebQuery HTTP endpoint of your TeamSpeak 6 server. Usually http://192.168.178.2:10080.
teamspeak6._comment_api_key: Your TeamSpeak 6 ServerQuery API key. It is shown ONCE in the server logs on first startup. If lost, you have to create a whole new server.
teamspeak6._comment_server_id: The ID of the virtual server you want to display. Default is usually '1'.
